<div class="introtosingle__main" style="text-align: center; padding-bottom:0;">
<div class="introtosingle__main-withbackground">
<div class="introtosingle__main-title">
Introduction to Wikipedia</div>
<div class="introtosingle__lead">
<p><big><b><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> is made by <a href="/wiki/Special:RecentChanges" title="Special:RecentChanges">people like <strong>you</strong></a>.</b></big>
</p>
This page takes you through a set of tutorials aimed at <em>complete newcomers</em> who wish to contribute. It covers all the basics, and each tutorial takes only a few minutes, so you can become a proficient <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Wikipedians" title="Wikipedia:Wikipedians">Wikipedian</a> quickly.</div>
<div style="padding: 20px 60px;">
<p><span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_Wikipedia" title="Help:Introduction to Wikipedia"><span class="mw-ui-button mw-ui-progressive" style="width:8em; margin-bottom:20px; margin-top:10px; font-size:200%; line-height:2em; border-radius:5px;">Get started</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_policies_and_guidelines/1" title="Help:Introduction to policies and guidelines/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:16em; margin-bottom:10px;">Policies and Guidelines</span></a></span><br>
</p>
<div class="introtosingle__columns">
<div class="introtosingle__columns-left">
<figure class="mw-halign-right skin-invert" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_editing_with_Wiki_Markup/1" title="Help:Introduction to editing with Wiki Markup/1"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bb/Source_editor_logo.svg/250px-Source_editor_logo.svg.png" decoding="async" width="160" height="56" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bb/Source_editor_logo.svg/330px-Source_editor_logo.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="641" data-file-height="224"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure><div style="clear:both;" class=""></div>
The <b><a href="/wiki/Help:Wikitext" title="Help:Wikitext">wiki markup source editor</a></b> shows the underlying page source code. It works like a plain text file, indicating links and other items using simple code like this: <code>[[Earth]]</code>.<div style="clear:both;" class=""></div>
<p><span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_editing_with_Wiki_Markup/1" title="Help:Introduction to editing with Wiki Markup/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Editing</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_referencing_with_Wiki_Markup/1" title="Help:Introduction to referencing with Wiki Markup/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Referencing</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_images_with_Wiki_Markup/1" title="Help:Introduction to images with Wiki Markup/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Images</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_tables_with_Wiki_Markup/1" title="Help:Introduction to tables with Wiki Markup/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Tables</span></a></span>
</p>
</div>
<div class="introtosingle__columns-right">
<figure class="mw-halign-left" typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_editing_with_VisualEditor/1" title="Help:Introduction to editing with VisualEditor/1"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/12/VisualEditor-logo.svg/250px-VisualEditor-logo.svg.png" decoding="async" width="160" height="56" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/12/VisualEditor-logo.svg/330px-VisualEditor-logo.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="641" data-file-height="225"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure><div style="clear:both;" class=""></div>
<b><a href="/wiki/Help:VisualEditor" title="Help:VisualEditor">VisualEditor</a></b> is the easier way of editing that works more like a word processor and hides the underlying source code. Links and other items are edited using toolbar and pop-up interfaces.<div style="clear:both;" class=""></div>
<p><span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_editing_with_VisualEditor/1" title="Help:Introduction to editing with VisualEditor/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Editing</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_referencing_with_VisualEditor/1" title="Help:Introduction to referencing with VisualEditor/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Referencing</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_images_with_VisualEditor/1" title="Help:Introduction to images with VisualEditor/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Images</span></a></span><br>
<span class="plainlinks clickbutton"><a href="/wiki/Help:Introduction_to_tables_with_VisualEditor/1" title="Help:Introduction to tables with VisualEditor/1"><span class="mw-ui-button" style="width:11em; margin-bottom:10px;">Tables</span></a></span>
</p>
</div>
</div>

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Introduction to Wikipedia

Wikipedia is made by people like you.

This page takes you through a set of tutorials aimed at complete newcomers who wish to contribute. It covers all the basics, and each tutorial takes only a few minutes, so you can become a proficient Wikipedian quickly.

Get started
Policies and Guidelines


The wiki markup source editor shows the underlying page source code. It works like a plain text file, indicating links and other items using simple code like this: [[Earth]].

Editing
Referencing
Images
Tables

VisualEditor is the easier way of editing that works more like a word processor and hides the underlying source code. Links and other items are edited using toolbar and pop-up interfaces.

Editing
Referencing
Images
Tables
